paper_abstract: In this paper, we prove the Hyers-Ulam stability for the following functional inequalities: parallel to f(x(1), y(1)) + f(x(2), y(2)) + f(x(3), y(3))parallel to <= parallel to f(x(1) + x(2) + x(3), y(1) + y(2) + y(3))parallel to, (1) parallel to f(x(1), y(1)) + f(x(2), y(2)) + f(x(3), y(3))parallel to <= parallel to 2f (x(1) +x(2) + x(3)/2, y(1) + y(2) + y(3)/2)parallel to, (2) parallel to f(x(1,) y(1)) + f(x(2), y(2)) + 2f(x(3), y(3))parallel to <= parallel to 2f (x(1) + x(2)/2 + x(3), y(1) + y(2)/2 + y(3))parallel to (3) in Banach spaces.
paper_title: FUNCTIONAL INEQUALITIES ASSOCIATED WITH BI-CAUCHY ADDITIVE FUNCTIONAL EQUATIONS
